About Me

I am passionate about the intersection of logic and creativity. My goal is to craft digital experiences that are not only visually stunning but also practical and user-centric.

With diverse experience in data engineering, automation, and digital transformation, I bring a holistic perspective covering both User Experience and Visual Design.

Currently pursuing my Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering at Naresuan University, I've had the opportunity to work on impactful projects ranging from RPA automation to machine learning implementations.

Delta Electronics (Thailand) Public Co., Ltd.

Digital Solution Intern

July - December 2025
Bangkok, Thailand

Explored and implemented digital solutions to support HR digital transformation through workflow automation, while organizing workshops to equip employees with digital tools and supporting application testing.

Key Responsibilities & Achievements

RPA Project (UiPath)

Engineered and deployed automated workflows for HR processes including Talent Acquisition (Offer Letters), C&B (Travel Insurance), and Expat Visa processing, significantly reducing manual workload.

Predictive Analytics POC

Implemented Machine Learning models for Talent Development to analyze historical data and forecast employee trends using Python and SQL.

Lucky Draw System

Architected a real-time web application using Firebase and GitHub to support 20,000+ users for the New Year event, ensuring high availability and engagement.

ChatGPT Workshop

Co-conducted a global workshop 'Writing Effective Prompts for HR Professionals' for teams in China, India, and Slovakia.

Microsoft Planner Workshop

Organized and facilitated training for 120+ employees to drive digital tool adoption and enhance cross-functional collaboration.

DeltaHi Application Testing

Performed rigorous Manual and UAT testing for both Mobile App and Web Admin Portal to ensure system quality.
